source: Eurostat nama_10_a10 (B1G, CP_MEUR, ES) + nama_10_co3_p3 (CP_MEUR, ES)

production_mapping.materials: nace_r2 B-E (energy included in this aggregate)
production_mapping.energy: not separated in A10; included in materials
production_mapping.services: nace_r2 G-I, J, K, L, M_N, O-Q, R-U

notes.needs_allocation: Household consumption total (P3_S14) allocated proportional to production shares.
